verses.verse: Then said<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> unto me<WH4872>, Though Moses and Samuel<WH8050> stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> me<WH5315>, yet my mind could not be toward this people<WH5971>: cast them out<WH7971> of my sight<WH6440>, and let them go forth<WH3318>.
